title: Make the Leading Coefficient "1"
text: Divide by the leading coefficient on both sides which gives $${\left(y-7\right)}^2=12$$.
speech: Divide by the leading coefficient on both sides which gives  parentheses y minus 7,  squared is equal to 12 .

title: Use Square Root Property
text: The square root property: if $$x^2$$ $$=$$ k, then $$x$$ $$=$$ $$\sqrt{k}$$, or $$x$$ $$=$$ $$-\sqrt{k}$$, or $$x$$ $$=\sqrt{k}$$. $${\left(y-7\right)}^2=12$$, we can take square root both sides and get $$y-7=\sqrt{12}$$ or $$y-7=-\sqrt{12}$$.

title: Final Answer
text: Therefore, $$4{\left(y-7\right)}^2=48$$ has two solutions which are $$y=-7+2\sqrt{3}$$, and $$y=7+2\sqrt{3}$$.
speech: Therefore,  4 times, parentheses y minus 7,  squared is equal to 48  has two solutions which are  y, is equal to negative 7 plus, 2 the square root of 3 , and  y is equal to, 7 plus, 2 the square root of 3 .
